title: [Discussion] AIML Credit Split(2024 batch)
content:
Isn't the first 2 sem 24 cred each 
Doesn't make sense

comments.body: Likely a mistake because result also says 24 credits each for 1st two sems

It's correct, the first 2 sem are 22 credits only,
2- 5 credit, 2- 4 credit, 1- 3 credit, 1- 1 credit
For 24-28 batch the first 2 sems were for 24 credits each
If it was then the credits will be adjusted to special topics in any of the sem
They sent corrected version of this through mail
What is summer term? Nd is it also for 2 credits?
